title: SEARCHING FOR A WATER SUPPLY CONNECTION IN THE CABOOL, MISSOURI DISEASE OUTBREAK OF ESCHERICHIA COLI 0157 H7
cause: 43 water meter replacements and 2 line breaks
detection: residents and visitors to the community of Cabool
monitoring: water samples of 200 ml volume were collected
investigation: review data,  conduct a sanitary survey and collect additional  water samples
inspection of  the drinking water supply system and operating  practice
distribution system model to  study the pattern of illness occurrences
